mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs, of the Old & New Testament: faithfully translated into English meetre. For the use, edification and comfort of the saints in publick and private, especially in New-England. [Eight lines of Scripture references and texts]
Bible. Bay Psalm book. Psalms
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Tracy W. McGregor Library. Mather Collection. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contains thirteen compositions for 2 voices; textless. Ninth edition is the first to contain music. [original]
Signatures: A-S¹², ²A⁶ (I4 missigned as I3; I6 as I4) [original]
First edition with music and with Cotton Mather's appendix (10 p. at end.)-- Holmes, 53-E. [original]
Error in paging: p. 415 misprinted as 154. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: Leaves C1, K1, K12, N1 and N12 wanting; leaves E5-11 (p. 105-118) mutilated. Bound in full calf. Housed in a custom-fit beige cloth covered clamshell box. Provenance: From the library of William G. Mather, with his bookplate and Wm. G. Mather Accession No. 786 on front paste-down. Tracy W. McGregor Library, Mather Collection. This copy recataloged through a generous grant from the McGregor Fund. [original]
